resources.string: Species you may encounter based on you location
Every officially registered specie in the country
We Need Your Permission to Access Location
Your current location is used to find species you may encounter in your area. Provided information is one-time only and we DO NOT store them on our servers.

Couldn\'t retrieve your current location. Current location is used to find species you may encounter in your area, so you won\'t be able to use this feature right now. \n\nCheck your location settings to turn on GPS.
Pick your location manually tapping on deisred area

Nearby species not found… This may be because you are outside of the supported countries, your GPS is turned off or you did not allow us to access your location. Please turn GPS on and try again or pick your location manually. If the problem persists, contact us.
